                                java.util.List<Pokemon> party,
                                boolean player)
        Prepares the button used to represent party members.
        Parameters:
        partyBox - the box that contains party member buttons
        party - the party whose information is to be inserted
        player - true if the party to be inserted is the player's party, false otherwise

      • setButtonsFlashingEffect

        private javafx.animation.Timeline setButtonsFlashingEffect(javafx.scene.layout.HBox partyBox,
                                                           boolean player)
        Configures an animation that makes the party's buttons flash. This is used when moving party members around.
        Parameters:
        partyBox - box containing the party members' buttons
        player - true if the party to be inserted is the player's party, false otherwise
        Returns:
        Timeline object containing the requested animation.

      • displayConnectionBlock

        public void displayConnectionBlock(boolean block)
        Blocks user input end displays that the game is waiting for a connection. Used when starting battle in server mode.
        Parameters:
        block - true to display the message, false to hide it
        See Also:
        disableInput(boolean)

      • parsePokemonInfo

        Converts Pokémon information in String format into Pokemon object
        Parameters:
        splitInfo - String array containing Pokémon information
        Returns:
        Pokemon representation of inserted data
        See Also:

      • parseTrainerInfo

        private void parseTrainerInfo(java.lang.String info)
        Converts Pokémon and Trainer information into objects. The enemy name and party is then loaded into memory.
        Parameters:
        info - String representation of the information about the trainer and their party
        See Also:
        createTeamInfo()
